curam.core.struct

Class CuramTerm

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.type.struct.Struct<CuramTerm>
      • curam.core.struct.CuramTerm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeepCloneable, java.io.Serializable

    public final class CuramTerm
extends Struct<CuramTerm>
    Represents a single search condition. This object is a container for specific search term types. Five term types are supported:

    • StandardTerm
    • DateTerm
    • DateRangeTerm
    • DateTimeTerm
    • DateTimeRangeTerm

      Only one term type must be specified per search and the corresponding boolean flag must be set to true .
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
